meanings.sent1: The hungry child was unappeased even after eating a big meal.
meanings.sent2: The customer was unappeased with the poor service at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The unappeased cat kept meowing for more food, even though its bowl was full.
meanings.sent4: Her unappeased curiosity drove her to keep asking questions about the mysterious box.
meanings.sent5: The unappeased desire for adventure led him to explore the unknown forest.

meanings.sent1: The storm left behind an unappeased feeling of unease in the village.
meanings.sent2: Despite the apology, she remained unappeased by his insincere words.
meanings.sent3: The unappeased baby continued to cry even after being rocked to sleep.
meanings.sent4: His unappeased anxiety kept him awake at night, worrying about the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent5: The unappeased tension in the room made everyone feel on edge.

meanings.sent1: The protestors were unappeased by the government's empty promises.
meanings.sent2: Her unappeased anger simmered beneath the surface, ready to erupt at any moment.
meanings.sent3: The unappeased dog barked loudly until its owner gave it a treat.
meanings.sent4: His unappeased thirst for knowledge drove him to read every book in the library.
meanings.sent5: The unappeased crowd demanded justice for the unfair treatment they had received.
